<div align="center">

# MoonBot

[![wakatime](https://wakatime.com/badge/user/018dc603-712a-4205-a226-d4c9ccd0d02b/project/961df823-98f8-4b39-a2ee-233ba70e13ec.svg)](https://wakatime.com/badge/user/018dc603-712a-4205-a226-d4c9ccd0d02b/project/961df823-98f8-4b39-a2ee-233ba70e13ec) ![OneBot 12](https://img.shields.io/badge/OneBot-12-black?logo=data:image/png;base64,) ![OneBot 11](https://img.shields.io/badge/OneBot-11-black?logo=data:image/png;base64,)

<image src="./logo.png" width="210" />

**MoonBot is a chatbot framework base on MoonBit which follow [OneBot](https://onebot.dev/) protocol.**

> The project is still under development.

</div>

## Features

- Built-in plugins system
- Easy to use API
- Modular design
- Flexible configuration
- Built-in plugins for common tasks
- Easy to extend

## Getting Started

To get started, you need to install MoonBot and create a new bot project.

## Contributing

Contributions are always welcome! Please read the [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) first.
